## readIndex3 variable

Inline function. Returns vec3 (x,y,z components) at index `i` in `tex`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readIndex3: (tex: Sampler2DTerm, i: IntTerm, size: IVec2Term) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Swizzle<"vec3">
```
